content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Measurement and Analysis process helps in defining a project management strategy to align measurement objectives and practices with identified information needs and business objectives.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Measurement activity is an effective way of improving project processes and practices. Measurements help to perform the following:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"increase overall understanding of a process or activity;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"support predicting, planning, estimating and tracking performance of a project (for example quality, schedule, effort, costs).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Measurement objectives (metrics to be calculated and measurement frequency) are defined by Delivery Manager/Project Manager in the\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/:w:/r/sites/policy/_layouts/15/Doc.aspx?sourcedoc=%7B9B0A009C-053E-4083-8A88-BF479EAA13DB%7D&file=PID_MeasurementPlan.dotx&action=default&mobileredirect=true\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Measurement plan.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" These measurement objectives should be in line with project needs, customer expectations, and organizational business objectives.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Delivery Manager/Project Manager collects measurement data from systems as per the frequency defined in the Measurement Plan. Then Delivery Manager/Project Manager cleans data in order to obtain a representative set of measures. After that Delivery Manager/Project Manager conducts analysis, interprets results and prepares a preliminary conclusion. According to the results of analysis, Delivery Manager/Project Manager defines appropriate actions and review plans and discusses results with relevant stakeholders. The results of analysis should be stored in appropriate repositories.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Delivery Manager/Project Manager may select metrics Blocks in blue are external process areas; blocks in green are sub processes of the represented process.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
